name: Blink Agent Builder
description: The world's fastest AI app builder and first vibe coding platform that builds AI agents. Turn any idea into a beautiful, fully working app in seconds from a simple prompt. Demonstrated capability to rebuild Cursor, Perplexity, and Shortcut with no code required.
community_quotes: First vibe coding platform for AI agents
Can rebuild complex apps like Cursor and Perplexity

name: Mastra
description: TypeScript AI agent framework from the team behind GatsbyJS. Reached 1.0 stable production release with features including workflows, memory management, streaming, tool-calling agents, agent networks, and workflow orchestration.
